result.eng: We spent a year and a half doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith muid bliain go leith i mbun na hoibre
result.orig: Chaith muid bliain go leith i mbun na hoibre
result.html: Chaith muid bliain go leith i mbun na hoibreWe spent a year and a half doing that work.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ muid bliain go leiṫ i mbun na hoibreWe spent a year and a half doing that work.

result.eng: They accused the manager of theft.
result.ga: Chuir siad gadaíocht i leith an bhainisteora
result.orig: Chuir siad gadaíocht i leith an bhainisteora
result.html: Chuir siad gadaíocht i leith an bhainisteoraThey accused the manager of theft.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad gadaíoċt i leiṫ an ḃainisteoraThey accused the manager of theft.

result.ga: Chuir siad i mo leith gur inis mé bréaga
result.orig: Chuir siad i mo leith gur inis mé bréaga
result.html: Chuir siad i mo leith gur inis mé bréagaThey accused of having lied.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad i mo leiṫ gur inis mé bréagaThey accused of having lied.

result.eng: The work is attributed to Leonardo da Vinci.
result.ga: Cuirtear an saothar i leith Leonardo da Vinci
result.orig: Cuirtear an saothar i leith Leonardo da Vinci
result.html: Cuirtear an saothar i leith Leonardo da VinciThe work is attributed to Leonardo da Vinci.
result.ponchtml: Cuirtear an saoṫar i leiṫ Leonardo da VinciThe work is attributed to Leonardo da Vinci.

result.ga: Dearcadh an phobail i leith na Gaeilge
result.orig: Dearcadh an phobail i leith na Gaeilge
result.html: Dearcadh an phobail i leith na GaeilgeThe public's attitude to Irish.
result.ponchtml: Dearcaḋ an ṗobail i leiṫ na GaeilgeThe public's attitude to Irish.

result.eng: The author makes a reference to a specific case.
result.ga: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leith
result.orig: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leith
result.html: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leithThe author makes a reference to a specific case.
result.ponchtml: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do ċás ar leiṫThe author makes a reference to a specific case.

result.ga: Féach cé atá ag teacht i leith
result.orig: Féach cé atá ag teacht i leith
result.html: Féach cé atá ag teacht i leithLook who's coming our way!
result.ponchtml: Féaċ cé atá ag teaċt i leiṫLook who's coming our way!

result.eng: The exam lasted an hour and a half.
result.ga: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leith
result.orig: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leith
result.html: Mhair an scrúdú uair go leithThe exam lasted an hour and a half.
result.ponchtml: Ṁair an scrúdú uair go leiṫThe exam lasted an hour and a half.

result.eng: The colour is shading towards red.
result.ga: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirg
result.orig: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirg
result.html: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirgThe colour is shading towards red.
result.ponchtml: Tá an daṫ ag dul i leiṫ an deirgThe colour is shading towards red.

result.ga: Tóg treo i leith an chósta
result.orig: Tóg treo i leith an chósta
result.html: Tóg treo i leith an chóstaTake bearings for the coast.
result.ponchtml: Tóg treo i leiṫ an ċóstaTake bearings for the coast.

result.eng: Come here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ga: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat
result.orig: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat
result.html: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ i leiṫ uait Isteaċ an ċisteanaċ leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!

result.html: Gabh i leith uaitCome here.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ i leiṫ uaitCome here.

result.eng: There will be a special edition, the last show of the season.
result.ga: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúir
result.orig: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúir

result.ponchtml: Eagrán ar leiṫ a ḃeas ann seó deireanaċ an tséasúirThere will be a special edition, the last show of the season.

result.eng: He particularly hates the royal family.
result.ga: Tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríoga
result.orig: Tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríoga
result.html: Tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríogaHe particularly hates the royal family.
result.ponchtml: Tá col ar leiṫ aige leis an teaġlaċ ríogaHe particularly hates the royal family.

result.eng: There was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ga: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.orig: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theas
result.html: Bhí gaineamh do gach leith dínn soir siar thuaidh theasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí gaineaṁ do gaċ leiṫ dínn soir siar ṫuaiḋ ṫeasThere was sand to every side of us, east and west, north and south.

result.eng: The darkness was to every side of us.
result.ga: Bhí an dorchadas do gach leith dínn
result.orig: Bhí an dorchadas do gach leith dínn
result.html: Bhí an dorchadas do gach leith dínnThe darkness was to every side of us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an dorċadas do gaċ leiṫ dínnThe darkness was to every side of us.

result.eng: They carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ga: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
